table.name: vtiger_webhook_settings
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_webhook_settings` ( `settings_name` varchar(200) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `settings_value` text NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`settings_name`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_webhook_workflows
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_webhook_workflows` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `entity_id` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `type` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `method` varchar(30) DEFAULT NULL, `create_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `sent_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL, `status` enum('Success','Queued','Failed') DEFAULT NULL, `logs` text, `request` text, `response` text, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
